_comment: Created by EFisher on 26/03/2014 16:47:29 using v2.1
title: How many people with depression/anxiety disorders access services and has this changed?
analysis_commentary: The access rate of people with anxiety and/or depression to IAPT services was 2.5% in 2012/13 Quarter 4. This was a slight increase from 2.0%, when the data was initially collected in 2011/12 Quarter 1. This relates to nearly 31,000 extra individuals a quarter with anxiety and/or depression receiving IAPT services.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Data Set
